name: Design file starter template
description:
A file template to start from. Add this to your folders, duplicate when you're ready to work on a new feature.


You can follow along with how I use this file in my design system video on YouTube


I'll work every now and then on updating the documentation in the file, but I am also open to suggestions. message me on twitter if you have any comments or questions, or leave a comment in the file.


I've worked with large design teams using Figma at Microsoft and I've picked up on some of their practices on documenting files.


If you are on a paid subscription with Figma, utilize the shared libraries by moving the components in this file into their own file and reference those components in this file.


If this was helpful, come and say hi on Twitter @darianrosebrook üëãüèº


https://twitter.com/darianrosebrook
